TopicTitle: Do you have a moment to talk about our Lord and Savior?

Articles.Content:
Station under construction! Used KAS to add struts and lights. =]

Edited February 5, 2014 by LucianHavens
there is always time to talk about jeb
Yeah... Unfortunate symbolism if you deorbit that thing.

LOL, the expression of the face suits the image perfectly.

Finally a place to post this. I thought I was the only one.

This is one of the building stages of a rotating space station I've completed and which still orbits Kerbin.
I would de-orbit that, its offensive to some ppl

I would de-orbit that, its offensive to some ppl

Are you serious? I think you're kidding.

Remember this tends to be an explosive topic, so let's please keep it friendly, people.

How is this a spacecraft to exchange???. I don't get it

Also just saying but if you read the rules. It says on the forbidden content no religious nature

Edited February 5, 2014 by Dooz

You should make symbols from other religions too.

I am sure that this one symbol is so popular that nobody cares, but after making symbols from other religions this thread would be deleted

Are you serious? I think you're kidding.

Remember this tends to be an explosive topic, so let's please keep it friendly, people.

not kidding about the offensive part... have you ever seen a religious topic come up on an internet forum? never ends well lol.

not kidding about the offensive part... have you ever seen a religious topic come up on an internet forum? never ends well lol.

Well, as an atheist I don't find anything like that offensive. I'd expect religious people to be respectful to other religions, and not get offended when they see one of it's symbols.
It just happened to look this way when I was building the station. Thought it would be somewhat amusing to have that meme with an KSP theme. Did not intend to offend anyone.
Okies ppl, no offence was meant, it was just a casual observation by the OP.. lets all enjoy the rest of our day.
